Imports

../core/enums, ../core/input, ../core/nim_object

Types

NodeHandler = proc (self: NodeRef): void
NodeInputHandler = proc (self: NodeRef; event: InputEvent)
NodeObj = object of RootObj
  is_ready*: bool
  name*: string
  kind*: NodeKind
  nodetype*: NodeType
  pausemode*: PauseMode
  parent*: NodeRef
  children*: seq[NodeRef]
  on_enter*: NodeHandler       ## Called, when entered in the scene.
  on_exit*: NodeHandler        ## Called, when exited from the scene.
  on_ready*: NodeHandler       ## Called after `on_enter`.
  on_process*: NodeHandler     ## Called every tick.
  on_input*: NodeInputHandler
  properties*: NimRef          ## Custom properties. You can change it at any time.
  
NodeRef = ref NodeObj

Vars

standard_handler: NodeHandler = proc (self: NodeRef) = discard
standard_input_handler: NodeInputHandler = proc (self: NodeRef; event: InputEvent) = discard

Procs

proc Node(name: string = "Node"): NodeRef {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Creates a new Node object.

Arguments:

  • name is a node name.

Examples:

var test_node = Node("My node")
proc `~`(self: NodeRef; path: string): NodeRef {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Alias for getNode method.

Examples:

var test_node = Node()
discard test_node ~ "../../../hello"
proc contains(self, other: NodeRef): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Alias for hasNode method.

Examples:

var test_node = Node()
assert not (Node() in test_node)

Methods

method draw(self: NodeRef; w, h: float) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
method handle(self: NodeRef; event: InputEvent; mouse_on: var NodeRef) {...}{.base,
    raises: [], tags: [].}
method addChild(self, child: NodeRef) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Adds a new child. 
method addChilds(self: NodeRef; childs: varargs[NodeRef]) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Adds one or more childs. 
method getAllChilds(self: NodeRef): seq[NodeRef] {...}{.base, raises: [Exception],
    tags: [RootEffect].}

Examples:

var
  root = Node()
  child1 = Node()
  child2 = Node()
  child1_1 = Node()
  child2_1 = Node()
  child2_2 = Node()
root.addChilds(child1, child2)
child2.addChilds(child2_1, child2_2)
child1.addChild(child1_1)
assert root.getAllChilds == @[child1, child1_1, child2, child2_1, child2_2]
method getChild(self: NodeRef; index: int): NodeRef {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Gets child at specific position. 
method getChildCount(self: NodeRef): int {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
method getChildPosition(self, other: NodeRef): int {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns other position. 
method getNode(self: NodeRef; path: string): NodeRef {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Gets node by it name. 
method getParent(self: NodeRef): NodeRef {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns parent node, if available. 
method getPath(self: NodeRef): string {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns full node path. 
method getPauseMode(self: NodeRef): PauseMode {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
method getRoot(self: NodeRef): NodeRef {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns root node. 
method hasNode(self: NodeRef; name: string): bool {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns true, when node with name name in the self children. 
method hasNode(self, other: NodeRef): bool {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns true, when other in the self children. 
method hasParent(self: NodeRef): bool {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns true, when self has parent node. 
method isParentOf(self, other: NodeRef): bool {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns true, when self is a parent of other. 
method remove(self, other: NodeRef) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Removes other from children, if available.

Macros

macro `@`(node: NodeRef; callable, code: untyped): untyped
Convenient alias for handlers.

Example

var node = Node()
node@on_enter(self):
  echo self.name

Templates

template nodepattern(t: untyped)
template duplicate(self: NodeRef): untyped
Duplicates Node object. It is an alias for deepCopy proc.
